name: Lifestyles of the Shadowy & Infamous
description:
# Live a Little!

When the job is done and the battle won, or at least when you’ve managed to not entirely bleed out, it’s good to have a place to go. Lifestyles of the Shadowy & Infamous provides rules to flesh out your doss, making it truly what you want it to be. Do you want someone to tidy up the place while you’re away? A place with extra privacy, whether it be physical, Matrix, or astral? Or maybe just a place near your favorite club? The options are here, as well as rules on the effects of these options. Open the book and build your dream home! Or at least a place you can afford with minimal rodents!
